# nxos_tacacs_provider_group (Data Source)

This data source can read the Tacacs Provider Group configuration.

- API Documentation: [aaaTacacsPlusProviderGroup](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/dme-docs-10-2-2/docs/Security%20and%20Policing/aaa:aaaTacacsPlusProviderGroup/)

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "nxos_tacacs_provider_group" "example" {
  name = "group1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) TACACS+ provider group name.

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `deadtime` (Number) Dead time for TACACS+ server.
- `id` (String) The distinguished name of the object.
- `providers` (Attributes List) List of providers. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--providers))
- `source_interface` (String) Source Interface.
- `vrf` (String) VRF name.

<a id="nestedatt--providers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `providers`

Read-Only:

- `name` (String) TACACS+ provider name.
- `order` (Number) Order of the providers.
